SEARCH
Package UIs

Class UIUtilities

java.lang.Object
UIs.UIUtilities
public class UIUtilities extends Object
Class that contains some methods utilities for the UIs to allow the user to interact with the platform

  • Constructor Details

    • UIUtilities

      public UIUtilities(DataBase database, User user)
      Constructor of the class UIUtilities
      Parameters:
      database - the database of the platform
      user - the user that is logged in

  • Method Details

    • toggleEvaluationLike

      public void toggleEvaluationLike(Buyer user, Evaluation evaluation)
      Method that allows the user to like the evaluation made by another user, unless the user is the author of the evaluation. Also gives experience points to the author of the evaluation if he gets his first like, and updates the metrics of both users.
      Parameters:
      user - the user that made the evaluation
      evaluation - the evaluation that the user wants to like

    • toggleBuyerToFollowing

      public void toggleBuyerToFollowing(Buyer user, Buyer buyer)
      Method that allows the user to follow/unfollow another buyer and update both their metrics, unless the buyer is himself. Also gives experience points to both users if they follow each other.
      Parameters:
      user - the user that wants to follow another buyer
      buyer - the buyer that the user wants to follow

    • toggleProductToWishList

      public void toggleProductToWishList(Buyer user, Product product)
      Method that allows the user to like/unlike a product and update the metrics of both the user and the product.
      Parameters:
      user - the user that wants to like/unlike the product
      product - the product that the user wants to like/unlike

    • toggleSellerToFollowing

      public void toggleSellerToFollowing(Buyer user, Seller seller)
      Method that allows a buyer to follow/unfollow a seller to get his notifications. Also updates the metrics of both the buyer and the seller.
      Parameters:
      user - the buyer that wants to follow/unfollow the seller
      seller - the seller that the buyer wants to follow/unfollow

    • deleteAccount

      public void deleteAccount()
      Method that allows the user to delete his account from the platform

    • modifyAddress

      public void modifyAddress()
      Method that allows the user to modify his address

    • modifyPersonalInfo

      public void modifyPersonalInfo(Buyer user)
      Method that allows the buyer to modify his personal info. Doesn't modify his id or email if they are already taken.
      Parameters:
      user - the buyer that wants to modify his personal info

    • modifyPersonalInfo

      public void modifyPersonalInfo(Seller user)
      Method that allows the seller to modify his personal info. Doesn't modify his id or email if they are already taken.
      Parameters:
      user - the seller that wants to modify his personal info

    • modifyPassword

      public void modifyPassword()
      Method that allows the user to modify his password

    • getUserInputAsInteger

      public int getUserInputAsInteger()
      Method that takes an input from the user and returns it as an integer
      Returns:
      the input of the user as an integer
